test.description: Run all Lume tests. You can run only one test with `deno task test tests/<filename>`

changelog.description: Run the changelog utility to format the CHANGELOG.md file

update.description: Run the nudd utility to update dependencies. I.e. `deno task update deps/dom.ts`

update-deps.description: Update all dependencies to the latest version. Add `--dry-run` to don't write the changes
update-deps.command: deno task update 'deps/*.ts' deno.json && git checkout deps/react.ts deps/tailwindcss.ts
